00032 template<class T_Container> class ValueMappingPropertyDescriptor : public ListPropertyDescriptor {

00211 /*  ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00212     ~ValueMappingPropertyDescriptor
00213     ------------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00214 template<class T_Container> ValueMappingPropertyDescriptor<T_Container>::
00215 	~ValueMappingPropertyDescriptor() 
00216 {
00217     if (m_dyn_policy) {
00218         delete m_policy;
00219     }
00220     m_policy = 0; 
00221 }

00223 /*  ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00224     Init
00225     ------------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00226 template<class T_Container> void ValueMappingPropertyDescriptor<T_Container>::
00227 	Init(const T_Container& pairs, const MappingPolicy* policy, const CHAR* context_id)
00228 {
00229     m_text_icon_pairs = pairs;
00230 
00231     if (policy == 0) {
00232         m_policy = new MappingPolicy();
00233         m_dyn_policy = TRUE;
00234     }
00235     else {
00236         m_policy = policy;
00237     }
00238     if (context_id != 0) {
00239         Base::Init(context_id);
00240     }
00241 }

00263 /*  ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00264     IsInstanceOf
00265     ------------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00266 template<class T_Container> BOOLEAN ValueMappingPropertyDescriptor<T_Container>::
00267 	IsInstanceOf(const INT id) const
00268 {
00269     return ValueMappingPropertyDescriptor::ID == id || Base::IsInstanceOf(id);
00270 }   // IsInstanceOf

00272 /*  ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00273     SetProperty
00274     ------------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00275 template<class T_Container> BOOLEAN ValueMappingPropertyDescriptor<T_Container>::
00276 SetProperty(ResourceParser& parser, const GuiObjectFactory::PropertyId property_id)
00277 {
00278 #ifdef APOXI_ARAGON_SUPPORT
00279     BOOLEAN success = FALSE;
00280 
00281     switch (property_id) {
00282         case GuiObjectFactory::TextIconPairProp: {
00283             INT count = 0;
00284             success = parser.GetPropertyValue(GuiObjectFactory::TextIconPairCountProp, (void*) &count);
00285             if (success) {
00286                 GuiObjectFactory::ParseType parse_type = GuiObjectFactory::MapPropertyIdToParseType(property_id);
00287                 if (parse_type == GuiObjectFactory::TextIconPairType) {
00288                     WString text;
00289                     WString image_uri;
00290                     Image* img;
00291                     for (INT i = 0; i < count; i++) {
00292                         img = 0;
00293                         text = parser.ReadWString();
00294                         image_uri = parser.ReadWString();
00295                         if (!image_uri.IsEmpty()) {
00296                             ChildBinData* data = ResourceManager::GetInstance().GetData(image_uri, parser.GetResourceUri());                
00297                             if (data != 0) {
00298                                 img = ImageFactory::CreateImage(data, &success);
00299                             }
00300                         }
00301                         if (text.IsEmpty() && img == 0) {
00302                             DBG_OUT((35700, "ValueMappingPropertyDescriptor::SetProperty: No text and no icon defined a value.\n"));
00303                         }
00304                         Item* item = new Item(0, text, ImageObtainer(img));
00305                         if (item != 0) {
00306                             m_text_icon_pairs.PushBack(item);
00307                         }
00308                     }
00309                     success = m_text_icon_pairs.GetSize() > 0;
00310                 }
00311             }
00312             break;
00313         }
00314         case GuiObjectFactory::MappingPolicyProp: {
00315             GuiObjectIterator iterator(parser);
00316             if (iterator.HasNext()) {
00317                 m_policy = (MappingPolicy*) GuiObjectFactory::Create(parser, iterator.GetNext());
00318                 success = m_policy != 0;
00319             }
00320             break;
00321         }
00322         case GuiObjectFactory::ItemProp: {
00323             GuiObjectIterator item_it(parser);
00324             while (item_it.HasNext()) {
00325                 Item* item = (Item*) GuiObjectFactory::Create(parser, item_it.GetNext());
00326                 if (item != 0)
00327                     m_text_icon_pairs.PushBack(item);
00328             }
00329             item_it.Release();
00330             break;
00331         }
00332         default: {
00333             success = Base::SetProperty(parser, property_id);
00334             break;
00335         }
00336     }
00337     return success; 
00338 #else //APOXI_ARAGON_SUPPORT
00339     return FALSE;
00340 #endif //APOXI_ARAGON_SUPPORT
00341 }   // SetProperty
00342 
00343 /*  ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00344     GetIcon
00345     ------------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00346 template<class T_Container> ImageObtainer ValueMappingPropertyDescriptor<T_Container>::
00347 	GetIcon(const Property* property) const {
00348     ImageObtainer icon;
00349     if (property != 0) {
00350         if (property->IsInstanceOf(Property::ID)) {
00351             ASSERT_DEBUG(property->GetDataItem().GetDataType() == BooleanType || 
00352                 property->GetDataItem().GetDataType() == NumberType);
00353             ASSERT_DEBUG(m_policy != 0);
00354             INT size = m_text_icon_pairs.GetSize();
00355             if (size > 0) {
00356                 INT idx = m_policy->GetIndex(property->GetDataItem());
00357                 if (idx >= 0 && idx < size && m_text_icon_pairs[idx] != 0) {
00358                     icon = m_text_icon_pairs[idx]->GetIcon();
00359                 }
00360             }
00361         }
00362     }
00363     return icon;
00364 }   // GetIcon
00365 
00366 /*  ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00367     GetIcon
00368     ------------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00369 template<class T_Container> ImageObtainer ValueMappingPropertyDescriptor<T_Container>::
00370 	GetIcon(const DataItem& value) const {
00371     DBG_OUT((5003, L"Obsolete - Please retrieve the icon with the property.\n"));
00372     ImageObtainer icon;
00373     ASSERT_DEBUG(m_policy != 0);
00374     INT size = m_text_icon_pairs.GetSize();
00375     if (size > 0) {
00376         INT idx = m_policy->GetIndex(value);
00377         if (idx >= 0 && idx < size && m_text_icon_pairs[idx] != 0) {
00378             icon = m_text_icon_pairs[idx]->GetIcon();
00379         }
00380     }
00381     return icon;
00382 }   // GetIcon
00383 
00384 /*  ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00385     GetIcon
00386     ------------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00387 template<class T_Container> ImageObtainer ValueMappingPropertyDescriptor<T_Container>::
00388 	GetIcon(INT index) const {
00389     ImageObtainer icon;
00390     if (index < m_text_icon_pairs.GetSize()) {
00391         m_text_icon_pairs[index]->GetIcon();
00392     }
00393     return icon;
00394 }   // GetIcon
00395

00398     ------------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00399 template<class T_Container> WString ValueMappingPropertyDescriptor<T_Container>::
00400 	GetText(const Property* property) const {
00401     WString text;
00402     if (property != 0) {
00403         if (property->IsInstanceOf(Property::ID)) {
00404             ASSERT_DEBUG(property->GetDataItem().GetDataType() == BooleanType ||
00405                 property->GetDataItem().GetDataType() == NumberType);
00406             ASSERT_DEBUG(m_policy != 0);
00407             INT size = m_text_icon_pairs.GetSize();
00408             if (size > 0) {
00409                 INT idx = m_policy->GetIndex(property->GetDataItem());
00410                 if (idx >= 0 && idx < size && m_text_icon_pairs[idx] != 0) {
00411                     text = m_text_icon_pairs[idx]->GetText();
00412                 }
00413             }
00414         }
00415     }
00416     return text;
00417 }   // GetText

00420     GetText
00421     ------------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00422 template<class T_Container> WString ValueMappingPropertyDescriptor<T_Container>::
00423 	GetText(const DataItem& value) const {
00424     DBG_OUT((5003, L"Obsolete - Please retrieve the text with the property.\n"));
00425     WString text;
00426     ASSERT_DEBUG(m_policy != 0);
00427     INT size = m_text_icon_pairs.GetSize();
00428     if (size > 0) {
00429         INT idx = m_policy->GetIndex(value);
00430         if (idx >= 0 && idx < size && m_text_icon_pairs[idx] != 0) {
00431             text = m_text_icon_pairs[idx]->GetText();
00432         }
00433     }
00434     return text; 
00435 }   // GetText
